trans-unit.source: Defines an MSBuild task that returns a path to the installation folder to be written into a customized document.
trans-unit.target: 定义一个 MSBuild 任务，该任务返回要写入自定义文档的安装文件夹的路径。

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: 此类不能被继承。

trans-unit.source: The document must be part of an Office development project for a 2007 Microsoft Office system application.
trans-unit.target: 文档必须是 2007 Microsoft Office 系统应用程序的 Office 开发项目的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Set all of the <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentInstallationPath> properties, and then call <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentInstallationPath.Execute%2A> to run this task.
trans-unit.target: 设置所有<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentInstallationPath>属性，，然后调用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentInstallationPath.Execute%2A>若要运行此任务。

trans-unit.source: The Microsoft Build Engine uses <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks> to build and deploy Office solutions.
trans-unit.target: Microsoft Build Engine 使用<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks>生成和部署 Office 解决方案。

trans-unit.source: However, you can create your own build system by using these classes and the MSBuild XML-based project files.
trans-unit.target: 但是，可以使用这些类并基于 MSBuild XML 项目文件来创建你自己生成系统。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [MSBuild Reference](~/msbuild/msbuild-reference.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅[MSBuild 参考](~/msbuild/msbuild-reference.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentInstallationPath" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentInstallationPath" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Creates the output folder and, if applicable, the installation folder, where the customized document is published.
trans-unit.target: 在发布自定义文档的位置创建输出文件夹和安装文件夹（如果适用）。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the output folder for the document was generated successfully; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果成功生成该文档的输出文件夹，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Gets the relative or fully qualified path of the installation folder to be written into a customized document.
trans-unit.target: 获取要写入自定义文档的安装文件夹的相对路径或绝对路径。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents the relative or fully qualified path of the installation folder to be written into a customized document.
trans-unit.target: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> ，它表示要向其中写入一个自定义文档的安装文件夹的相对或完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: This path can be relative for local drives and network drives, but HTTP/HTTPS locations must be a fully qualified path.
trans-unit.target: 对于本地驱动器和网络驱动器，此路径可以是相对路径，但 HTTP/HTTPS 位置必须是完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: Sets the installation path where the customized document is copied for installation.
trans-unit.target: 设置安装路径，自定义文档将复制到此处以用于安装。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the relative or fully qualified path of the customized document for installation.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示用于安装的自定义文档的相对或完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: This path can be relative for local drives and network drives, but HTTP/HTTPS locations must be a fully qualified path.
trans-unit.target: 对于本地驱动器和网络驱动器，此路径可以是相对路径，但 HTTP/HTTPS 位置必须是完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: Sets the publish path where the customized document is copied for publishing.
trans-unit.target: 设置发布路径，自定义文档将复制到此处以用于发布。

trans-unit.source: A string that represents the relative or fully qualified path of the customized document for publishing.
trans-unit.target: 一个字符串，表示用于发布的自定义文档的相对或完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: This path can be relative for local drives and network drives, but HTTP/HTTPS locations must be a fully qualified path.
trans-unit.target: 对于本地驱动器和网络驱动器，此路径可以是相对路径，但 HTTP/HTTPS 位置必须是完全限定路径。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentInstallationPath.PublishUrl%2A> property must be assigned before <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentInstallationPath.Execute%2A> is called.
trans-unit.target: <xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentInstallationPath.PublishUrl%2A>属性必须之前分配<xref:Microsoft.VisualStudio.Tools.Office.BuildTasks.GenerateOfficeDocumentInstallationPath.Execute%2A>调用。
